skins.shipDescription: Yorktown-class aircraft carrier ©` Hornet, Hull Number CV-8!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Yorktown class' youngest, Hornet! Hmm? Yep, Northampton is my friend! But I don't get what she's thinking. I'm not like my sisters, but I'm strong as well!
skins.acquisition: Yo! I'm Hornet! Ah.... I don't want to impose, but don't call me Big Wasp and we'll be fine~ My sisters are both legendary, but just wait and see what I can do!
skins.login: Nice weather, Commander. Wanna go somewhere?
skins.details: Hmm? Commander, you always look at me. Is there something you want to say to me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, if you space out again I'm gonna hit you with a wooden stick~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Wanna hear about my older sisters? Hmmhmm, now which of them are you smitten by?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Northampton? Well, she's a bit rigid, but she's not a bad girl~
skins.secretaryTouch: I am confident in my own self!

skins.shipDescription: Congratulations! You did it, Commander! Now let's pop the champagne and celebrate! It's party time!
skins.acquisition: Congratulations! You did it, Commander! Now let's pop the champagne and celebrate! It's party time!
skins.login: Heyyy? Commander, I'm looking pretty hot tonight, huh?
skins.details: It's a party, you gotta eat a lot! What if you eat too much? "No problem, just work out and sweat it off later!" How's my Enty impression?
skins.secretaryIdle1: This one's Enty's, this one's Yorktown's, this one's Northampton's, this one's... oh, it's yours, Commander! Exactly one bottle. Pretty nice, huh?
skins.secretaryIdle2: So I have to dress up like this for the party? Aren't you worried I'm gonna be a fish out of water in there?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm not expecting anyone to call me the belle of the ball tonight. Not while everyone else is dressed up all pretty-like. What? You think I give up too easily?
skins.secretaryTouch: Is this dress gonna make you fall in love with me all over again? Ahahaha!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Turns out I'm pretty different from my sisters, huh...?

skins.shipDescription: Mmmmm... Nothing beats pizza straight outta the oven! Here, Commander, wanna give it a try? We're gonna have to recommend this to Enty next time!
skins.acquisition: Mmmmm... Nothing beats pizza straight outta the oven! Here, Commander, wanna give it a try? We're gonna have to recommend this to Enty next time!
skins.login: If you can't decide what to order, get a bit of everything! Just kiddin'~?
skins.details: Cheese sure is good stuff~ By the way, Commander, do you like Sardegna-style pizza or Eagle Union-style pizza better? ...Me? It's all good to me, hahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Want something to drink? Cola? Or maybe some oolong tea? What'll it be?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey, Hammann, don't just waste food like that! I, I'll help you out! ...Commander, I'm gonna need another stomach over here!
skins.secretaryIdle3: That Zuikaku, only ordering boneless wings... Eh? Bring the green chili sauce? ...Ah! Not a bad idea...!
